name: Clonazepam

dosing.adult_acute: Panic disorder: 0.25 mg BID; Seizures: 0.5 mg TID
dosing.adult_maintenance: Panic: 1-4 mg/day divided BID; Seizures: 0.5-20 mg/day divided
dosing.notes: Long-acting benzodiazepine; FDA-approved for panic disorder; ODT formulation available; higher potency

canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: 2-4 mg/day for panic; avoid chronic use
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 0.5-1 mg BID-TID; higher doses for akathisia or agitation
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 0.25-0.5 mg BID; titrate slowly; time-limited use; taper plan from onset

warnings: Black box warning: (1) Concomitant use with opioids may result in respiratory depression, coma, death; (2) Abuse, misuse, addiction; (3) Dependence and withdrawal
Physical dependence with regular use - difficult withdrawal
Withdrawal seizures possible - MUST taper slowly (10% dose reduction every 1-2 weeks)
HIGH abuse potential - Schedule IV controlled substance
Should be SHORT-TERM use only; avoid long-term except seizure disorders

cautions.renal: Use with caution; metabolites may accumulate
cautions.hepatic: Reduce dose in hepatic impairment; increased sensitivity
cautions.pregnancy: Pregnancy Category D - avoid; teratogenic risk
